## Hi!

I'm Esben, currently pursuing a PhD in exercise epidemiology. My work focuses on developing machine learning models to analyze accelerometry data, specifically for classifying non-wear time and sleep. This helps provide objective and robust assessments of sleep quality at the population level. Feel free to explore this site and discover what I spend my time on.

### Education
2023 | PhD in exercise epidemiology

2017 | MS in sports science, human physiology

2014 | BS in sports science

### Experience
2018 - 2019 | Research assistant, Department of Sport Science, Aarhus University

2019 - 2020 | Research Assistant, Department of Sports Science and Clinical Biomechanics, University
of Southern Denmark

For a more comprehensive look at my education and experience, check out my [CV](CV.pdf).
